pullrequest.title: New start gate and ROS service to finish the game

content.raw:
Thanks for pointing it out. Here is the update: [#!/osrf/subt/commits/88fcf99378f7dda2255085d8600bb27839a75da7#Lsubt\_gazebo/worlds/cave.worldT91](#!/osrf/subt/commits/88fcf99378f7dda2255085d8600bb27839a75da7#Lsubt_gazebo/worlds/cave.worldT91)

I will also add a gif of the cave entrance.

**P.S.** Oh, I noticed that I directly add the starting area and the plugin into the generated world. I will add them to the script so they are automatically generated.
